frameset.edef: To come into force or in operation

example.parse: (S (SBAR-ADV (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS شاء) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_NOM الله))))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NOUN_NUM 3) (CONJ او) (NOUN_NUM 4) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN اشهر)))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يسري) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM مفعول) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاتفاق)))))
